entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
